about_the_game:
Enfilade is a fast paced low poly multiplayer fps game with 30 levels and 18 weapons.
If there are not enough players there is bot support.
Level up and unlock new weapons.

Game modes:

There are 4 game modes -- Free For All, Team Death Match, Domination, Gun Game

Map voting:

Players can vote for a map, the map with the most votes will be selected.

List of weapons:

3 Snipers -- M40A1, M107, SVD

3 Assault Rifles -- AK47, M4A1, Scar

5 SMGs -- Vector, Agram 2000, UZI, P90, MP5

2 Launchers --RPG-7, 40LMTS

1 Shotgun - M3

4 Pistols -- 1911, M9, 1911, P250

Options:

There are many options -- Aim toggle, Sound, Fov and more

Gun customization

There are 9 weapon skins and 6 attachments.

name: Enfilade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 767 MB available space
  • Sound Card: all
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel i6 or newer
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: all
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor
